title: New: ARY – Childhood Dreams
body:
Norway is on a hot streak right now – with the likes of Aurora, Kygo and Sigrid all making sizeable waves in the charts, and a whole host of exciting emerging artists bubbling away just under the radar.

Oslo’s **ARY** is all set to be the Scandinavian country’s next impressive export, with her latest single _Childhood Dreams_. This is a real earworm. Check it out below.
